Arbitrum Mainnet.__tokens_comment: tokens are loaded automatically from fordefi
Arbitrum Mainnet.__pool_manager_comment: Uniswap V4 use centralized pool manager for swapping, no more individual pool address
Arbitrum Mainnet.__universal_router_comment: V4 only supports universal router, no specific router like V3
Arbitrum Mainnet.__permit2_comment: universal router requires permit2 for token allowance
